common.emptyState.title: No items
common.emptyState.description: There are no items to display at the moment.
common.errorState.title: An error occurred
common.errorState.description: We couldn't load the data. Please try again later.
common.confirm.title: Confirm action
common.confirm.message: Are you sure you want to continue?
common.deleteReportConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the report for {customerName}? This action cannot be undone.
common.deleteSelectedReportsConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {count} reports? This action cannot be undone.
common.deleteCustomerConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the customer {name}? All related reports and information will also be deleted.
common.deleteBranchConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this branch? All users, reports, and data will be permanently removed.
common.offlineMode: You are offline. Changes will be synchronized when the connection is restored.

common.install.title: Install Agritectum app

issueTemplates.title: Select issue template
issueTemplates.noTemplatesFound: No templates found matching your criteria.
issueTemplates.roofEdgeLeak.title: Roof edge leak
issueTemplates.roofEdgeLeak.description: Water intrusion at the roof edge, usually caused by damaged flashing or poor sealing.
issueTemplates.chimneyLeak.title: Chimney leak
issueTemplates.chimneyLeak.description: Water intrusion around the chimney flashing, often due to deteriorated sealing or damaged flashing.
issueTemplates.missingTiles.title: Missing tiles
issueTemplates.missingTiles.description: Individual tiles have fallen off or are missing, exposing the roof structure.
issueTemplates.crackedTiles.title: Cracked tiles
issueTemplates.crackedTiles.description: Tiles with visible cracks, which can lead to water intrusion.
issueTemplates.generalWear.title: General wear
issueTemplates.generalWear.description: Normal aging and wear on the roof surface.
issueTemplates.roofSagging.title: Roof sagging
issueTemplates.roofSagging.description: Visible sagging or deflection in the roof structure, indicating potential structural problems.
issueTemplates.blockedVentilation.title: Blocked ventilation
issueTemplates.blockedVentilation.descri: Ventilation openings are blocked or obstructed, reducing air circulation.
issueTemplates.cloggedGutters.title: Clogged gutters
issueTemplates.cloggedGutters.descriptio: Gutters are filled with debris, preventing proper water drainage.
issueTemplates.damagedFlashing.title: Damaged flashing
issueTemplates.damagedFlashing.descripti: Metal flashing around penetrations is damaged or missing, creating potential leak points.
issueTemplates.mossGrowth.title: Moss
issueTemplates.mossGrowth.description: Moss or algae growth on the roof surface, which can retain moisture and cause damage.
inspection.roofEdgingHint: Check condition of fall protection and edge railings
inspection.cornersCrownsHint: Inspect corner details and wall transitions
inspection.skylightsHint: Check condition and sealing of skylights
inspection.technicalInstallationsHint: Inspect HVAC, vents, and other installations
